code:
stateDiagram-v2
  [Retail_Inventory] --> INIT
  INIT --> HANDSHAKING: on_connected(Retail_CouponSystem)
  HANDSHAKING --> STREAMING: on_first_data(Retail_OrderManagement) / on_heartbeat(Retail_OrderManagement)
  STREAMING --> DRAINING: on_eof_sent(Retail_Inventory) / on_eof_received(Retail_OrderManagement)
  DRAINING --> TERMINATED: on_ack(Retail_Inventory) with no pending
  STREAMING --> FAILED: on_error(Retail_Inventory) / heartbeat timeout
  DRAINING --> FAILED: on_error(Retail_CouponSystem)
  HANDSHAKING --> FAILED: on_error(Retail_Inventory)
  TERMINATED --> [Retail_CouponSystem]
  FAILED --> [Retail_CustomerLoyalty]
  STREAMING --> STREAMING: on_frame_sent(Retail_Inventory) / ACK pending
  DRAINING --> DRAINING: pending ACKs remain
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
